description:
This is a strategy game that involves basic addition and subtraction. Use your mental skills to stay within the zone of balance for as long as possible. Decide where to place the number block within 10 seconds for each move and keep racking up points to the score. When the difference crosses the mark of 150, you are out of the zone of balance.

//Music- 

https://files.freemusicarchive.org/storage-freemusicarchive-org/music/no_curator...
https://files.freemusicarchive.org/storage-freemusicarchive-org/music/no_curator...

This is my first game jam using the Godot Engine,  I enjoyed making this quick game, and I hope all of you enjoy it too :)
